usage.cn: 我爱你不是因为你是谁，而是我在你面前可以是谁。
usage.eng: I love you not for who you are, but for who I am before you.

usage.cn: ——你是我晚上睡觉前最想聊天的人，我爱这种感觉。
usage.eng: I love that you are the last person i want to talk to before i go to sleep at night.

usage.cn: 在找到合适的人之前，唯一需要做的，就是让自己足够的优秀。
usage.eng: Before finding the right people, the only need to do is to make yourself good enough.

usage.cn: 没有遇到你之前，我从来没想到自己会这样，毫无缘由的对着一个人傻笑。
usage.eng: Before I met you I never knew what it was like; to look at someone and smile for no reason
